actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on cathode drive unit includes 89-Kilowatt Gearmotor, synchronous belt, stainless steel bearing housing, bearings, stainless steel drive shaft, cooling water lead-through, stainless steel driveflange connection, rubber seals, PEEK high performance plastic, insulators, water fittings and metric stainless steel hardware.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on cathode drive unit includes 89-Kilowatt Gearmotor, synchronous belt, stainless steel bearing housing, bearings, stainless steel drive shaft, cooling water lead-through, stainless steel driveflange connection, rubber seals, PEEK high performance plastic, insulators, water fittings and metric stainless steel hardware.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on cathode drive unit includes 89-Kilowatt Gearmotor, synchronous belt, stainless steel bearing housing, bearings, stainless steel drive shaft, cooling water lead-through, stainless steel driveflange connection, rubber seals, PEEK high performance plastic, insulators, water fittings and metric stainless steel hardware.
